name: Artful Dodge
text: You are practiced at avoiding attacks when outnumbered.
benefit: If you are the only character threatening an opponent, you gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC against that opponent.
special: The Artful Dodge feat acts as the Dodge feat for the purpose of satisfying prerequisites that require Dodge. You can use Intelligence, rather than Dexterity, for feats with a minimum Dexterity prerequisite.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to gain a +1 dodge bonus for each opponent that you threaten that no other ally threatens. (Melee Tactics Toolbox 7)
text_zh: 你熟练于人数上处于劣势时的避战方式。
benefit_zh: 若你是唯一一个威胁目标的单位，在对抗该目标时你的AC获得+1闪避加值。
special_zh: 在计算满足先决条件时，巧妙闪躲专长可以视为闪避专长。你可以用智力而非敏捷来满足需要最低敏捷作为先决条件的专长。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来对所有你是唯一一个威胁他们的目标获得+1闪避加值。
